Trade/Device Name(s): Audit® MicroCV™ Vitamin D Linearity Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Audit® MicroCV™ Vitamin D Linearity Set, an assayed quality control material for verifying linearity and calibration range of Vitamin D assays
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to simulate human patient serum samples for determining linearity, calibration verification, and reportable range verification for Vitamin D in quantitative assays; for in vitro diagnostic use only
